Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Veterans

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Department of Defense to closely examine its policies around cultural diversity and sensitivity and to impose more effective and comprehensive training regiments for military personnel in cultural awareness, diversity and sensitivity to prevent the discrimination and harassment of all military personnel, including servicemen and women within its ranks.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: U.S. Department of Defense to closely examine its policies around cultural diversity and sensitivity.

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Veterans

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending:  Speaker Quinn, Greenfield, Dromm, Fidler, Gentile and Eugene

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the United States Department of Defense to closely examine its policies around cultural diversity and sensitivity and to impose more effective and comprehensive training regiments for military personnel in cultural awareness, diversity and sensitivity to prevent the discrimination and harassment of all military personnel, including servicemen and women within its ranks.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: U.S. Department of Defense to closely examine its policies around cultural diversity and sensitivity.
